extension.summary: Emby Server as a Docker container
extension.description:
Emby organizes video, music and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart televisions, streaming boxes and mobile devices.
This addon uses the official Emby Server docker images. Please visit https://emby.media for emby related support. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more info on the wrapper addon.
